attributes.action: Demand PHE acknowledges clear evidence of harm from wireless radiation & 5G.

attributes.background: There is overwhelming scientific evidence of harm to health from radiofrequency radiation as used in mobile networks. 248 scientists have appealed to the UN and 1000s of studies show clear causal links between wireless radiation and harmful bio-effects, including cancer, on all living things.
